thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com | 2 of 59
thread.title: Barbar

author: Barbar
title: Barbar
text:
We're still in the midst of the process, but I've been very happy with the service I've received to date, and, especially the responsiveness.
I've been working with Michael Padro, and he's been great! I've been very impressed with how responsive he is on both messaging and phone calls. He's all over it, despite the three hour time difference. This is a new experience for me, and he's been very patient.
